full_description:
Kingston A400 120GB 2.5 inch SATA 3 Internal SSD

Kingston A400 120GB is a 2.5 inch SATA 3 supported Internal SSD. It delivers a a hi-performance hi-speed with a good reading and writing speed. This SSD is part of Kingston's A400 Series SATA 3.This SSD has SATA Rev. 3.0 (6Gbps) with backwards compatibility to SATA Rev. 2.0 (3Gbps) as connection Interface. It is available in 2.5 Inch Sata 3.0. Kingstonâ€™s A400 solid-state drive dramatically improves the responsiveness of your existing system with incredible boot, loading and transfer times compared to mechanical hard drives. Powered by a latest-gen controller for read and write speeds of up to 500MB/s and 450MB/s1, this SSD is 10x faster than a traditional hard drive for higher performance, ultra-responsive multi-tasking and an overall faster system. Also more reliable and durable than a hard drive, A400 is available in multiple capacities from 120GB to 1.92TB . These 2.5 inch SSDs works with lower power, lower heat and quicker loading time. This SSD is Ideal for laptops & small form factor PCs. The efficient performance and SATA Rev 3.0 design makes A400 ideal for thin notebooks and systems with limited space.Easily integrate into designs with SATA Rev 3.0 connectors. Perfect for thin laptops and small form factor PCs. A400 is also more reliable and durable than a regular hard drive. This SSD is from the A400 Series that is available in various capacities ranging from 120GB  up to 1.92TB to meet your data storage requirements and give you all the space you need for applications, documents, photos, videos, and more. This model is available in 120 GB capacity. The form factor is 2.5 Inch SATA Rev 3.0. The Endurance reading is 40TBW. The Power Consumption reading is 0.279W on average. The Vibration reading for this SSD is 2.17G Peak (7â€“800Hz) when operating and 20G Peak (10â€“2000Hz) when non-operating. full_description:
Kingston KC2500 250GB  PCIe 4.0 NVMe M.2 SSD

The Kingston KC2500 250GB SSD Delivers Powerful Performance Using The Latest Gen 3.0 X 4 Controller And 96-Layer 3D TLC NAND. Kingston KC2500 250GB SSD Delivers Outstanding Endurance And Improves Workflow In Desktop, Workstations, And High-Performance Computing (HPC) Systems With Reading/Write Speeds Up To 3,500/1200MB/S. The compact M.2 design provides greater flexibility while also increasing storage and saving space. Available in capacities ranging from 250GB to 2TB2 to meet the needs of your system. The Kingston KC2500 250GB SSD Is A Self-Encrypting Drive That Provides End-To-End Data Protection Using XTS-AES 256 Bit Hardware-Based Encryption And Allows The Use Of Independent Software Vendors With TCG Opal 2.0 Security Management Solutions Like Symantec, McAfee, WinMagic, And Others. The Kingston KC2500 250GB SSD also includes Microsoft EDrive support, which is a security storage specification that may be used with BitLocker. The Kingston KC2500 250GB NVMe PCIe SSD comes with a 05-year warranty.

The Kingston KC3000 PCIe 4.0 NVMe M.2 SSD provides next-generation performance by utilizing the most recent Gen 4x4 NVMe controller and 3D TLC NAND. The small M.2 2280 architecture integrates effortlessly onto motherboards, providing additional flexibility where high-power consumers value responsiveness and faster loading times. The Kingston KC3000 512GB SSD comes with a 05-year warranty.

Kingston A400 960GB 2.5 inch SATA 3 Internal SSD

Kingston A400 960GB is a 2.5 inch SATA 3 supported Internal SSD. It delivers a a hi-performance hi-speed with a good reading and writing speed. This SSD is part of Kingston's A400 Series SATA 3.This SSD has SATA Rev. 3.0 (6Gbps) with backwards compatibility to SATA Rev. 2.0 (3Gbps) as connection Interface. It is available in 2.5 Inch SATA Versions. Kingstonâ€™s A400 solid-state drive dramatically improves the responsiveness of your existing system with incredible boot, loading and transfer times compared to mechanical hard drives. Powered by a latest-gen controller for read and write speeds of up to 500MB/s and 450MB/s, this SSD is 10x faster than a traditional hard drive for higher performance, ultra-responsive multi-tasking and an overall faster system. Also more reliable and durable than a hard drive, A400 is available in multiple capacities from 120GB to 1.92TB . These 2.5 inch SSDs works with lower power, lower heat and quicker loading time. This SSD is Ideal for laptops & small form factor PCs. The efficient performance and SATA Rev 3.0 design makes A400 ideal for thin notebooks and systems with limited space.Easily integrate into designs with SATA Rev 3.0 connectors. Perfect for thin laptops and small form factor PCs. A400 is also more reliable and durable than a regular hard drive. This SSD is from the A400 Series that is available in various capacities ranging from 120GB  up to 1.92TB to meet your data storage requirements and give you all the space you need for applications, documents, photos, videos, and more. The Vibration reading for this SSD is 2.17G Peak (7â€“800Hz) when operating and 20G Peak (10â€“2000Hz) when non-operating. Kingston A400 960GB 2.5 inch SATA 3 Internal SSD offers 3 year of warranty.

full_description:
Kingston KC2500 1TB PCIe 4.0 NVMe M.2 SSD

The Kingston KC2500 1TB SSD provides strong performance by utilizing the most recent Gen 3.0 X 4 controller and 96-Layer 3D TLC NAND. With reading/write speeds of up to 3,500/2,900MB/S1, the Kingston KC2500 1TB SSD provides exceptional endurance and improves workflow in desktop, workstation, and high-performance computing (HPC) systems. The small M.2 design increases versatility while enhancing storage and reducing space. To satisfy the demands of your system, capacities ranging from 250GB to 2TB2 are available. The Kingston KC2500 1TB SSD Is A Self-Encrypting Drive That Provides End-To-End Data Protection Using XTS-AES 256 Bit Hardware-Based Encryption And Allows The Use Of TCG Opal 2.0 Security Management Solutions From Symantec, McAfee, WinMagic, And Others. The Kingston KC2500 1TB SSD also supports Microsoft EDrive, a secure storage specification that may be used in conjunction with BitLocker. The Kingston KC2500 1TB NVMe PCIe SSD comes with a 05-year warranty.
